Description: Set up Jira project for ChordCubes V1.50 Gold with proper epics user stories and tasks. Integrate with GitHub for automated issue tracking.
Create Jest/Cypress testing suite for ChordCubes with unit integration and E2E tests. Focus on core features: 3D rendering keyboard input and HUD components.
Configure GitHub Actions workflow for automated testing building and deployment to staging and production environments. Include security scanning and code quality checks.
